overview: Camille, 16 years old, shy and introverted, dreams of a different life, one far from her high school where she is constantly harassed by Nathalie, a schoolgirl with her other friends. Camille is very lonely, even if her parents (Michaël and Laurence) love her, but both of them don't have the time to listen and to notice their daughter's malaise. One day Laurence, Camille's mother, asks her to come with her to give a present to her father, Michaël. They both go to the pet shop.
title: Girl Bird
